title: Reliability Engineer Lead – Custom Silicon Management
summary: Do you love crafting sophisticated solutions to highly complex challenges? Do you intrinsically see the importance in every detail? At Apple, we go beyond the industry norm and demonstrate creativity in problem solving, ability to think dynamically and outside of standard convention, and adapt quickly to new technical areas. description: •You will drive requirements and execution of products, process and package qualification and reliability stress tests conditions and configurations from design stage all the way to successful qualification completion. •Drive and review Design for Reliability and Design for Test to ensure stress-ability and testability. •Lead all aspects of and ensure adequate preparation for qualification including such as corner skew material, BIB/Socket, waveform, electrical bias, thermal effect, lifetime estimation. •Implement POR of process flows, workmanship standards and supervise product performance. •Perform FAI (First Article Inspection) to ensure critical goals are reviewed before engineering, pre-production and production release for Product manufacturing. •Drive investigation and resolution on qualification fallouts and product and process nonconformance of MRB, RMA events through means of FA, CAR, 8D, and reporting. •Support PCN or ECN activities. •...
key_qualifications: BS+10 Years of relevant industry experience, Semiconductor engineering experience in the Reliability and/or Quality/Product Engineering role from multinational companies, Outstanding communication skills required, Experience in JEDEC reliability and quality related standards, ISO, and the science behind them, The ideal background will have experience of silicon product level reliability qualification and lifetime behavior model, You will know reliability fail modes of silicon/packaging technologies and fail mechanisms with respect to reliability, Prior experience defining hardware setups and equipment for life, environmental, ESD, Latch-Up and other tests, Validated auditing of supplier sites, materials and processes, Confirmed experience driving suppliers in the areas of silicon Fab process / packaging / assembly, test, ongoing reliability monitoring, post-production qualification, Familiar with process flows, specifications...
